017package org.apache.juneau.http.response;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.http.response.UnsupportedMediaType.*;
020
021import java.text.*;
022import java.util.*;
023
024import org.apache.http.*;
025import org.apache.http.Header;
026import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.http.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.http.header.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
031
032/**
033 * Exception representing an HTTP 415 (Unsupported Media Type).
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * The request entity has a media type which the server or resource does not support.
037 * <br>For example, the client uploads an image as image/svg+xml, but the server requires that images use a different format.
038 *
039 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
040 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common Basics</a>
041 * </ul>
042 *
043 * @serial exclude
044 */
045@Response
046@StatusCode(STATUS_CODE)
047@Schema(description=REASON_PHRASE)
048@FluentSetters
049public class UnsupportedMediaType extends BasicHttpException {
050   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
051
052   /** HTTP status code */
053   public static final int STATUS_CODE = 415;
054
055   /** Reason phrase */
056   public static final String REASON_PHRASE = "Unsupported Media Type";
057
058   /** Default status line */
059   private static final BasicStatusLine STATUS_LINE = BasicStatusLine.create(STATUS_CODE, REASON_PHRASE);
060
061   /** Reusable unmodifiable instance */
062   public static final UnsupportedMediaType INSTANCE = new UnsupportedMediaType().setUnmodifiable();
063
064   /**
065    * Constructor.
066    *
067    * @param cause The caused-by exception.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
068    * @param msg The message.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
069    * @param args The message arguments.
070    */
071   public UnsupportedMediaType(Throwable cause, String msg, Object...args) {
072      super(STATUS_CODE, cause, msg, args);
073      setStatusLine(STATUS_LINE.copy());
074   }
075
076   /**
077    * Constructor.
078    */
079   public UnsupportedMediaType() {
080      this((Throwable)null, REASON_PHRASE);
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Constructor.
085    *
086    * @param msg The message.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
087    * @param args Optional {@link MessageFormat}-style arguments in the message.
088    */
089   public UnsupportedMediaType(String msg, Object...args) {
090      this((Throwable)null, msg, args);
091   }
092
093   /**
094    * Constructor.
095    *
096    * @param cause The cause.  Can be <jk>null</jk>.
097    */
098   public UnsupportedMediaType(Throwable cause) {
099      this(cause, cause == null ? REASON_PHRASE : cause.getMessage());
100   }
101
102   /**
103    * Constructor.
104    *
105    * <p>
106    * This is the constructor used when parsing an HTTP response.
107    *
108    * @param response The HTTP response to copy from.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
109    * @throws AssertionError If HTTP response status code does not match what was expected.
110    */
111   public UnsupportedMediaType(HttpResponse response) {
112      super(response);
113      assertStatusCode(response);
114   }
115
116   /**
117    * Copy constructor.
118    *
119    * @param copyFrom The bean to copy.
120    */
121   protected UnsupportedMediaType(UnsupportedMediaType copyFrom) {
122      super(copyFrom);
123   }
124
125   /**
126    * Creates a modifiable copy of this bean.
127    *
128    * @return A new modifiable bean.
129    */
130   public UnsupportedMediaType copy() {
131      return new UnsupportedMediaType(this);
132   }
133
134   // <FluentSetters>
135
136   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BasicRuntimeException */
137   public UnsupportedMediaType setMessage(String message, Object...args) {
138      super.setMessage(message, args);
139      return this;
140   }
141
142   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BasicRuntimeException */
143   public UnsupportedMediaType setUnmodifiable() {
144      super.setUnmodifiable();
145      return this;
146   }
147
148   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
149   public UnsupportedMediaType setHeader2(String name, Object value) {
150      super.setHeader2(name, value);
151      return this;
152   }
153
154   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
155   public UnsupportedMediaType setHeaders(HeaderList value) {
156      super.setHeaders(value);
157      return this;
158   }
159
160   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
161   public UnsupportedMediaType setHeaders2(Header...values) {
162      super.setHeaders2(values);
163      return this;
164   }
165
166   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
167   public UnsupportedMediaType setLocale2(Locale value) {
168      super.setLocale2(value);
169      return this;
170   }
171
172   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
173   public UnsupportedMediaType setProtocolVersion(ProtocolVersion value) {
174      super.setProtocolVersion(value);
175      return this;
176   }
177
178   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
179   public UnsupportedMediaType setReasonPhrase2(String value) {
180      super.setReasonPhrase2(value);
181      return this;
182   }
183
184   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
185   public UnsupportedMediaType setReasonPhraseCatalog(ReasonPhraseCatalog value) {
186      super.setReasonPhraseCatalog(value);
187      return this;
188   }
189
190   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
191   public UnsupportedMediaType setStatusCode2(int code) throws IllegalStateException{
192      super.setStatusCode2(code);
193      return this;
194   }
195
196   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.http.response.BasicHttpException */
197   public UnsupportedMediaType setStatusLine(BasicStatusLine value) {
198      super.setStatusLine(value);
199      return this;
200   }
201
202   // </FluentSetters>
203}
